readme.name: Welcome
readme.content: # @ayanobot/rankcard Ayano's own Rank Card generator! ### Example using default settings, generated by Ayano The default font is currently Lyons Rounded. This most likely will change before release.

classes.name: RankCard
classes.description: A rank card, as used by Ayano!

params.name: input
params.description: The data for the rank card to initialise with

methods.name: calculateProgress
methods.description: Calculates the progress the progress bar should be at

methods.name: setBackground
methods.description: Sets the background of the rank card!

methods.name: setOverlay
methods.description: Sets the overlay of the rank card!

params.name: display
params.description: Whether the overlay should be displayed anymore

methods.name: setProgressBar
methods.description: Updates data about the progress bar's style!

params.name: rounded
params.description: Whether the progress bar should be rounded or not

params.name: colour
params.description: The colour to make the progress bar track!

params.name: fonts
params.description: The fonts to build the card with

typedefs.name: XPForLevel
typedefs.description: Calculates the amount of XP for a level.

params.name: level
params.description: The level to calculate the amount of XP for

returns.description: The amount of XP required for the provided level

typedefs.name: Font
typedefs.description: A font to register with Canvas for usage during building.

props.name: family
props.description: The name of the font family to register it under

typedefs.name: Input
typedefs.description: Input to generate the Rank Card with.

props.name: level
props.description: The level of the user the rank card is being generated for

props.name: xpForLevel
props.description: A function that calculates the amount of XP per level

props.name: user
props.description: The user to generate the rank card for

props.name: fonts
props.description: The fonts to register for usage during building

props.name: usernameLength
props.description: The length to shorten the username to

props.name: stripAccents
props.description: Whether accents should be stripped from the username or not

typedefs.name: BuildFonts
typedefs.description: Fonts provided when building to customise rank cards.

props.name: bold
props.description: The font to use for bold text

props.name: regular
props.description: The font to use for regular text
